title: Dua After Eating
bangla: Alhamdulillahil-lazi at'amana wa saqana wa ja'alana muslimin.
arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَجَعَلَنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
transliteration: Alhamdulillahil-lazi at'amana wa saqana wa ja'alana muslimin.
meaning: All praise is to Allah who has fed us and given us drink and made us Muslims.

title: Dua Before Sleeping
meaning: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.

title: Dua Upon Waking Up
bangla: Alhamdulillahil-lazi ahyana ba'da ma amatana wa ilayhin-nushur.
arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
transliteration: Alhamdulillahil-lazi ahyana ba'da ma amatana wa ilayhin-nushur.
meaning: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection.

title: Dua Before Entering Toilet
bangla: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-khubuthi wal-khaba'ith.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبْثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-khubuthi wal-khaba'ith.
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from all evil and evil-doers.

title: Dua After Wudu
bangla: Ashhadu an la ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lahu, wa ashhadu anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa rasuluhu.
arabic: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
transliteration: Ashhadu an la ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lahu, wa ashhadu anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa rasuluhu.
meaning: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, who has no partner; and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.

title: Dua When Leaving Home
bangla: Bismillahi, tawakkaltu 'alallah, la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah.
arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ، لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
transliteration: Bismillahi, tawakkaltu 'alallah, la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah.
meaning: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.

title: Dua When Entering Home
bangla: Bismillahi walajna, wa bismillahi kharajna, wa 'ala rabbina tawakkalna.
arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
transliteration: Bismillahi walajna, wa bismillahi kharajna, wa 'ala rabbina tawakkalna.
meaning: In the name of Allah we enter, in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we depend.

title: Dua Before Wearing Clothes
bangla: Alhamdulillahil-lazi kasaani hatha wa razaqanihi min ghayri hawlim minni wa la quwwah.
arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي كَسَانِي هَٰذَا وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
transliteration: Alhamdulillahil-lazi kasaani hatha wa razaqanihi min ghayri hawlim minni wa la quwwah.
meaning: All praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power nor might from myself.

title: Dua When Looking in Mirror
bangla: Allahumma anta hassanta khalqi fa hassin khuluqi.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ حَسَّنْتَ خَلْقِي فَحَسِّنْ خُلُقِي
transliteration: Allahumma anta hassanta khalqi fa hassin khuluqi.
meaning: O Allah, just as You have made my external features beautiful, make my character beautiful as well.

title: Dua When Starting Journey
bangla: Subhanallazi sakhkhara lana hadha wa ma kunna lahu muqrineen, wa inna ila rabbina lamunqalibun.
arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ، وَإِنَّا إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ
transliteration: Subhanallazi sakhkhara lana hadha wa ma kunna lahu muqrineen, wa inna ila rabbina lamunqalibun.
meaning: Glory to Him who has brought this under our control, though we were unable to control it. Indeed, to our Lord we will return.

title: Dua When in Distress
bangla: La ilaha illa anta subhanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimin.
arabic: لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
transliteration: La ilaha illa anta subhanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimin.
meaning: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.

title: Dua for Anxiety and Worry
bangla: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazani, wal-'ajzi wal-kasali, wal-bukhli wal-jubni, wa dala'id-dayni wa ghalabatir-rijal.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazani, wal-'ajzi wal-kasali, wal-bukhli wal-jubni, wa dala'id-dayni wa ghalabatir-rijal.
meaning: O Allah, I take refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow, weakness and laziness, miserliness and cowardice, the burden of debts and from being overpowered by men.
